cyclone.name: FLORENCE
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest then northwest toward the North Carolina / South Carolina coast

weather_observation.watch_coast: Edisto Beach, SC to the North Carolina–Virginia border including the Albemarle and Pamlico Sounds
weather_observation.impacted_coast: South Carolina through the Mid-Atlantic coast, including Chesapeake Bay and Maryland shoreline
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force gusts (35–45 mph) possible late Friday into Saturday
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor to moderate surge (1–3 ft) possible in upper Chesapeake Bay if track shifts north
weather_observation.rainfall: Heavy rainfall bands could bring 4–8 in of rain with urban and river flooding risk
weather_observation.other_hazards: Fresh-water flooding of rivers feeding Chesapeake Bay; extended periods of elevated seas disrupting vessel movements and cargo handling
